name: Claudia Volkman
what_you_do: I created my company, Creative Editorial Solutions, to support coaches, speakers, and entrepreneurs to help them amplify their voices and elevate their message.
offering: I can assist you at any stage, too. If you have just a nugget of a book concept or a finished manuscript, I'm proficient in executing all aspects of the publishing process. I'm highly skilled in developmental editing, copyediting, proofreading, copywriting, ghostwriting, layout and design/ typesetting and contract negotiations.
social_proof: I've helped publish hundreds of titles in the U.S. and abroad, including being part of a team that produced _Inside the Passion: An Insider's Look at The Passion of The Christ_ by John Bartunek, LC, with a Foreword by Mel Gibson, and _Superman Returns_ , an oversized illustrated custom coffee table book.
business_focus: To help coaches, speakers, and entrepreneurs amplify their voices and elevate their message through book publishing.
service_provided: developmental editing, copyediting, proofreading, copywriting, ghostwriting, layout and design, typesetting, contract negotiations
